9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Al-Fadl bin Abbas narrated:"I was a companion rider with the Messenger of Allah from Jam to Mina. He did not cease saying the Talbiyah until stoning Jamrat Al-Aqabah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مَتَى تُقْطَعُ التَّلْبِيَةُ فِي الْحَجِّ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Discontinuing The Talbiyah During Hajj
